topic.title: Where is the user.json file of the mac version zeronet?
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: _0.71____
  * Operating system: ___macos__
  * Web browser: _____chrome
  * Tor status: not available/always/disabled  disabled
  * Opened port: yes/no no
  * Special configuration: ___no_
Where is the user.json file of the mac version zeronet?

topic.title: Error message when posting a message on zeronet Content signing failed Contains too large 51829B> 50000B
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: _0.71____
  * Operating system:  debian10_____
  * Web browser: __frifox___
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port: yes/no
  * Special configuration: __no__

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
在zerome发布消息时，会弹出一个错误
Error message when posting a message on zeronet
Content signing failed
Contains too large 51829B> 50000B
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18365223/69623350-adbca800-107d-11ea-94d1-cc35b89e3a64.png)

topic.title: How Tor Browser 9 adds 127.0.0.1:43110 to no-proxy. Now, zeronet is hung on tor, but cannot be accessed with tor browser
topic.body: How Tor Browser 9 adds 127.0.0.1:43110 to no-proxy. Now, zeronet is hung on tor, but cannot be accessed with tor browser

1604067680_mirrored_omaidb_github.body:
@justinwiley @imachug  The site in question is here. I have deleted this site from the menu on the left of zerohello, but the error persists.
http://10.2.2.1:43110/17cNRuQ37T4u8uCeeNoxtVDyv9X57MBPbp/

Solved the problem, here the parameter is filled in 1024, after the value is smaller, sending the article is normal
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18365223/69657729-d06ab300-10b5-11ea-9156-311b5d1e90c4.png)

> 哦，您是网站的所有者吗？
I ’m not the site owner, and he has a new error。I don't know where to remove this wrong site, I didn't find it
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18365223/69829355-94bd1e00-125a-11ea-969d-5cdd204fcbaf.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18365223/69829386-b28a8300-125a-11ea-8206-186886f4446b.png)
I ignored the error and after a few days the error suddenly disappeared。I want to know what is going on with this mistake ..., which hero can explain how it works
